headline: MGRM: Monogram Technologies to be Acquired by Large Medical Device Company Zimmer Biomet Holdings
summary: By Thomas Kerr, CFA NASDAQ:MGRM | NYSE:ZBH READ THE FULL MGRM RESEARCH REPORT On July 14, 2025, Monogram (NASDAQ:MGRM) announced they were being acquired by leading medical device company Zimmer Biomet (NYSE:ZBH).
